content: total of 16 rounds right leg the force flowing motif charts for each size are at the end of the written instructions round 1 pm/sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 pm/sm knit to end of round round 2 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 3 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 4 sm p4 c4f p4 c4f p4 sm knit to end of round round 5 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 6 sm p2 t4b t4f twice p2 sm knit to end of round round 7 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 8 sm p2 k2 p4 c4f p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 9 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 10 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 11 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 12 sm p2 k2 p4 c4f p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 13 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 14 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 15 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 16 sm p2 k2 p4 c4f p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 17 sm p2 k2 p4 k4 p4 k2 p2 sm knit to end of round round 18 sm p2 t4f t4b twice p2 sm knit to end of round round 19 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 20 sm p4 c4f p4 c4f p4 sm knit to end of round repeat this 20 round pattern another 2 times 3 times in all as in the sample or until desired length then for optimal comfort in the front of the foot repeat rounds 1 and 2 before moving to the heel flap section #disturbanceintheforcesocks page 5 of 12 marie-elyse dugal designs left leg the force flowing motif charts for each size are at the end of the written instructions round 1 k8 12 16 pm/sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 pm/sm knit to end of round round 2 k8 12 16 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 3 k8 12 16 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 4 k8 12 16 sm p4 c4b p4 c4b p4 sm knit to end of round round 5 k8 12 16 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round round 6 k8 12 16 sm p2 t4b t4f twice p2 sm knit to end of round round 7 k8 12 16 sm
